comments.text:
Created attachment 8727172
well.com.xml


 IMAP: iris.well.com, 993,  STARTTLS, password-cleartext
  IMAP: iris.well.com, 993,  SSL,      password-cleartext
 POP3: iris.well.com, 995,  STARTTLS, password-cleartext
  POP3: iris.well.com, 995,  SSL,      password-cleartext
 SMTP: iris.well.com, 587,  STARTTLS, password-cleartext
  SMTP: iris.well.com, 587,  SSL,      password-cleartext
   SMTP: iris.well.com, 25,   STARTTLS, password-cleartext
   SMTP: iris.well.com, 25,   SSL,      password-cleartext
 username: %EMAILLOCALPART%


 Documentation
  * Services & Help > Using WELL Email # Basic configurations. Select and stick to just one incoming mail method to avoid damaging your email files.
    * http://www.well.com/emailhelp.html#configure
  * Services & Help > Settings for specific IMAP and POP mail clients # Thunderbird on a PC or Mac, with IMAP
    * http://www.well.com/imap-pop.html#tbirdimap
  * Services & Help > Settings for specific IMAP and POP mail clients # Thunderbird on a PC or Mac, with POP
    * http://www.well.com/imap-pop.html#tbirdpop
